charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 18 months; the cost of incarceration fee is waived. Upon release from imprisonment, the Defendant shall be placed on Supervised Release for a term of 3 years with standard and special conditions. Mandatory drug testing imposed. The Court has also imposed a "Zero Tolerance" condition for any violations. Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section 3663A, it is ordered that the Defendant make restitution to Great Wide in the amount of $127,091.08; the restitution is due immediately; interest on the restitution is waived. While restitution balance is outstanding, the Defendant shall not incur any form of debt. No fine. Defendant to pay $100.00 mandatory assessment, due immediately.

charges.charge_description: 18:659.F INTERSTATE OR FOREIGN SHIPMENT BY CARRIER(1)
